name: 《SpaceRescue2021》
description:
This is a two-player confrontation game,
P1:Players can play the role of cosmic hero cats to rescue your compatriots, you can pick up props to strengthen yourself, and rescue as many partners as possible before being swallowed by the universe electromagnetically;
P2:You can also play as the boss rabbit to hinder the rescue of your opponent. You can summon the rabbit police officer, set up obstacles, and even go out to chase the opponent yourself.
